similarities: Both documents are rental agreements for residential properties
Both documents specify the rent amount and maintenance charges
Both documents have a security deposit mentioned
differences: Doc 1 is in Pune while Doc 2 is in Mumbai
Doc 1 rent is ₹25,000 per month, while Doc 2 rent is ₹60,000 per month
Doc 1 maintenance is ₹2,000 per month, while Doc 2 maintenance is ₹5,000 per month
Doc 1 security deposit is ₹75,000, while Doc 2 security deposit is ₹2,00,000
unique_doc1: Tenant in Doc 1 is Ms. Priya Nair, a software engineer at Infosys Pune
Property address in Doc 1 is flat no. 302, Rose Residency, Baner, Pune – 411045
unique_doc2: Tenant in Doc 2 is Mr. Rahul Desai, a banker at HDFC Bank
Property address in Doc 2 is flat no. 502, Ocean Heights, Andheri West, Mumbai – 400053
